title: XR Technology-Based Experiential Learning Design: Enhancing Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematical concepts (functions, geometry) and basic digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Immersive math learning environment using AR/VR equipment, providing real-time feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Students can solve 3D geometric problems presented in an XR environment with 80% accuracy.
Through an XR module applying experiential learning theory, students can explain at least three cases of mathematical concept application.
Students can diagnose two or more individual learning weaknesses by analyzing learning data collected from interactive XR content.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
